about_the_game: Challenge your mind with Spell Slide, a block-pushing puzzle game where words are your key to success. Push letter blocks to form correct words, but be careful—every move must ensure that the number of incorrect words on the screen doesn’t increase. Strategize your way through each level to correct all the words, and as you progress, encounter new mechanics like locked doors and robots that help shift the letters. With its unique rules and escalating complexity, Spell Slide is a rewarding puzzle experience for players who love testing their logic and problem-solving skills!
